# AUDIO::SET_PED_CLOTH_EVENTS_ENABLED

## Summary
Set cloth events enabled on a given ped

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **BOOL** enabed

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Enables/disables ped's "quiet" footstep sound.
